name: The Heal Market
address: The Heal Market, E41st ave, Wales St, Vancouver, BC V5R 3N3

featured_reviews.review_id: This is the best place to get fresh and authentic sea moss in Vancouver. The owner is so sweet and her customer service is amazing. I ordered a jar but it was delayed due to shipping issues and the owner made it a point to make up for the delay. This is the only place I trust to buy my sea moss and it actually works!
featured_reviews.review_text: This is the best place to get fresh and authentic sea moss in Vancouver. The owner is so sweet and her customer service is amazing. I ordered a jar but it was delayed due to shipping issues and the owner made it a point to make up for the delay. This is the only place I trust to buy my sea moss and it actually works!

featured_reviews.review_id: Ordered 3 jars of sea moss from them. The shipping dates changed multiple times, which honestly was fine and I was very understanding of. When I received the product, the jars were bubbling and the product was seeping out of the top despite not being opened yet. I reached out to the company mutiple times by phone to no avail and then by text and patiently waited for a reply-to which I've been left hanging now for days. I was polite and very understanding and to be left in the dark for days after reaching out to them after spending good money is not very good business. Going to try ordering from Serenity Seamoss and hopefully I will get a refund from The Heal Market because the product was compromised. I'm not hopeful after the service I've received so far which is sad because I love supporting local businesses.
featured_reviews.review_text: Ordered 3 jars of sea moss from them. The shipping dates changed multiple times, which honestly was fine and I was very understanding of. When I received the product, the jars were bubbling and the product was seeping out of the top despite not being opened yet. I reached out to the company mutiple times by phone to no avail and then by text and patiently waited for a reply-to which I've been left hanging now for days. I was polite and very understanding and to be left in the dark for days after reaching out to them after spending good money is not very good business. Going to try ordering from Serenity Seamoss and hopefully I will get a refund from The Heal Market because the product was compromised. I'm not hopeful after the service I've received so far which is sad because I love supporting local businesses.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello! I'm so sorry for your poor experience. We reached out back via email and will be making sure you will be receiving our dry pouches of sea moss so you can make the sea moss gel yourself as well as receiving a refund for this order. We also stopped shipment of sea moss gel orders as we will start a new way of shipping it out. So sorry again.

featured_reviews.review_id: So it's been 3 weeks of consistent consumption and I absolutely LOVE it. Sea moss is doing amazing things for my body. I am releasing a lot of mucous build up, and overall I feel lighter and full of vitality. It only took 2 days of use to feel where my body was holding onto water and mucous, and another 2 days (4 in total) to release and feel cleansed. I am definitely going to buy your products for a long time to come, and I have already suggested your product to all my friends and family to try it!

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: That is amazing! Thank you Hazel we are glad you are feeling the benefits!

featured_reviews.review_id:
I ordered two jars of sea moss on July 15, I asked when it will be available for pick up on July 20 and have not heard anything since. Is this a scam?

*Update: I got my sea moss. It is tasty and does as it's intended .
featured_reviews.review_text:
I ordered two jars of sea moss on July 15, I asked when it will be available for pick up on July 20 and have not heard anything since. Is this a scam?

*Update: I got my sea moss. It is tasty and does as it's intended .
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello Adiam,
We apologize on the delay in our response in regards to your order. One of our team members will send you a message right now and will schedule your pick up. Sorry again for the delay in response and any inconvenience! This is not a scam your order is ready for pick up and we'll be in contact with you :)

featured_reviews.review_id: First order was some sea moss gel and some dry sea moss. Lasted us for months and was an immediate difference is energy levels and overall health. My wife suffers from severe eczema and her skins was some of the clearest we've seen in years while consistently using sea moss daily.

featured_reviews.review_id: I started taking their sea moss gel and instantly saw results. I felt a surge of energy. Had it with my morning tea, and can't wait to have some more! Great sea moss.
featured_reviews.review_text: I started taking their sea moss gel and instantly saw results. I felt a surge of energy. Had it with my morning tea, and can't wait to have some more! Great sea moss.

featured_reviews.review_id: Excellent customer service  5 star Golden sea moss. Quick delivery. I make sea moss gel to put in my smoothies and also use the gel on my face as a mask. My skin looks amazing. Thank you Heal Market.
featured_reviews.review_text: Excellent customer service  5 star Golden sea moss. Quick delivery. I make sea moss gel to put in my smoothies and also use the gel on my face as a mask. My skin looks amazing. Thank you Heal Market.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are so glad to hear that you are able to benefit from sea moss! Thank you for kind words and support!

featured_reviews.review_id:
First order a few months back!  Lasted for months and felt an immediate difference in energy levels and overall health.  Thank you, The Heal Market. I am above and beyond grateful for your products.
-Joyce
